Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Ramada Marcoola Beach in Marcoola, you'll be on the beach and close to Twin Waters Golf Club and Mt Coolum Golf Club. This 4-star hotel is within the vicinity of Sunshine Plaza and Coolum Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 118 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include desks and coffee/tea makers, and housekeeping is provided weekly.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don’t miss out on the many recreational opportunities, including an outdoor pool, a fitness center, and bicycles to rent.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include ATM/banking services and an elevator (lift). This hotel has 5 meeting rooms available for events. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Twin Waters Golf Club - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Mt Coolum Golf Club - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
Sunshine Plaza - 6 km / 3.7 mi
Coolum Beach - 7.9 km / 4.9 mi
Mooloolaba Beach - 9.3 km / 5.8 mi
Underwater World Sea Life - 9.6 km / 5.9 mi
Kawana Beach - 12.3 km / 7.6 mi
Big Pineapple - 13.2 km / 8.2 mi
Queensland Zoo - 13.2 km / 8.2 mi
Ginger Factory - 14.4 km / 9 mi
Aussie World - 17.3 km / 10.7 mi
Eumundi Market - 19.9 km / 12.4 mi
Dickey Beach - 20.5 km / 12.7 mi
Moffat Beach - 21.6 km / 13.4 mi
Shelly Beach - 22.7 km / 14.1 mi

The preferred airport for Ramada Marcoola Beach is Maroochydore, QLD (MCY-Sunshine Coast) - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
